00051 #define ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_IMAGE_UPGRADE_STATUS_ID             0x0006
00052 #define ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_MINIMUM_BLOCK_REQUEST_DELAY_ID      0x0009

00060 #define DEFINE_OTAU_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES \
00061         DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(upgradeServerID, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_UPGRADE_SERVER_ID, ZCL_IEEE_ADDRESS_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00062         DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(imageUpgradeStatus, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_IMAGE_UPGRADE_STATUS_ID, ZCL_8BIT_ENUM_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00063         DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(blockRequestDelay, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_MINIMUM_BLOCK_REQUEST_DELAY_ID, \
00064                                                   ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x0000, 0x0258), \
00065         DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(clusterRevision, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_CLUSTER_REVISION_ID, \
00066                                                   ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x0001, 0xfffe), \
00067         DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(upgradeActivationPolicy, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_UPGRADE_ACTIVATION_POLICY_ID, \
00068                                                   ZCL_8BIT_ENUM_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00, 0x01), \
00069         DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(upgradeTimeoutPolicy, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_UPGRADE_TIMEOUT_POLICY_ID, \
00070                                                   ZCL_8BIT_ENUM_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00, 0x01)
00071

00073         DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(clusterRevision, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_CLUSTER_REVISION_ID, \
00074                                                   ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x0001, 0xfffe)

00076 #define OTAU_HEADER_STRING_SIZE                                      32
00077 #define OTAU_MAX_REQ_BLOCK_SIZE \
00078           (APS_MAX_NON_SECURITY_ASDU_SIZE \
00079           - ZCL_IMAGE_BLOCK_RESP_HEADER_SIZE - ZCL_FRAME_STANDARD_HEADER_SIZE)
00080 
00081 // OTAU commands
00082 // list of commands id
00083 #define IMAGE_NOTIFY_ID                             0x00
00084 #define QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_REQUEST_ID                 0x01
00085 #define QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_RESPONSE_ID                0x02
00086 #define IMAGE_BLOCK_REQUEST_ID                      0x03
00087 #define IMAGE_PAGE_REQUEST_ID                       0x04
00088 #define IMAGE_BLOCK_RESPONSE_ID                     0x05
00089 #define UPGRADE_END_REQUEST_ID                      0x06
00090 #define UPGRADE_END_RESPONSE_ID                     0x07
00091 
00092 #define OTAU_IMAGE_NOTIFY_MAX_QUERY_JITTER_VALUE    100
00093 
00094 #define DEFINE_IMAGE_NOTIFY(otauImageNotifyInd) \
00095         DEFINE_COMMAND(imageNotify, IMAGE_NOTIFY_ID, \
00096         COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00097         otauImageNotifyInd)
00098 
00099 #define DEFINE_QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_REQUEST(otauQueryNextImageReqInd) \
00100         DEFINE_COMMAND(queryNextImageReq, QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_REQUEST_ID, \
00101         COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00102         otauQueryNextImageReqInd)
00103 
00104 #define DEFINE_QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_RESPONSE(otauQueryNextImageRespInd) \
00105         DEFINE_COMMAND(queryNextImageResp, QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_RESPONSE_ID, \
00106         COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00107         otauQueryNextImageRespInd)
00108 
00109 #define DEFINE_IMAGE_BLOCK_REQUEST(otauImageBlockReqInd)  \
00110         DEFINE_COMMAND(imageBlockReq, IMAGE_BLOCK_REQUEST_ID, \
00111         COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00112         otauImageBlockReqInd)
00113 
00114 #define DEFINE_IMAGE_PAGE_REQUEST(otauImagePageReqInd)  \
00115         DEFINE_COMMAND(imagePageReq, IMAGE_PAGE_REQUEST_ID, \
00116         COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00117         otauImagePageReqInd)
00118 
00119 #define DEFINE_IMAGE_BLOCK_RESPONSE(otauImageBlockRespInd) \
00120         DEFINE_COMMAND(imageBlockResp, IMAGE_BLOCK_RESPONSE_ID, \
00121         COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00122         otauImageBlockRespInd)
00123 
00124 #define DEFINE_UPGRADE_END_REQUEST(otauUpgradeEndReqInd) \
00125         DEFINE_COMMAND(upgradeEndReq, UPGRADE_END_REQUEST_ID, \
00126         COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00127         otauUpgradeEndReqInd)
00128 
00129 #define DEFINE_UPGRADE_END_RESPONSE(otauUpgradeEndRespInd) \
00130         DEFINE_COMMAND(upgradeEndResp, UPGRADE_END_RESPONSE_ID, \
00131         COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00132         otauUpgradeEndRespInd)
00133 
00134 #define OTAU_COMMANDS(otauImageNotifyInd, otauQueryNextImageReqInd, otauQueryNextImageRespInd, otauImageBlockReqInd,     \
00135         otauImagePageReqInd, otauImageBlockRespInd, otauUpgradeEndReqInd, otauUpgradeEndRespInd)                         \
00136         DEFINE_IMAGE_NOTIFY(otauImageNotifyInd),                                                             \
00137         DEFINE_QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_REQUEST(otauQueryNextImageReqInd),                                           \
00138         DEFINE_QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_RESPONSE(otauQueryNextImageRespInd),                                         \
00139         DEFINE_IMAGE_BLOCK_REQUEST(otauImageBlockReqInd),                                                    \
00140         DEFINE_IMAGE_PAGE_REQUEST(otauImagePageReqInd),                                                      \
00141         DEFINE_IMAGE_BLOCK_RESPONSE(otauImageBlockRespInd),                                                  \
00142         DEFINE_UPGRADE_END_REQUEST(otauUpgradeEndReqInd),                                                    \

00145 /***************************************************************************/
00155 #define OTAU_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)        \
00156   {                                                                           \
00157     .id = OTAU_CLUSTER_ID,                                                    \
00158     .options = {                                                              \
00159       .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE,                                        \
00160       .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY,                           \
00161       .reserved = 0},                                                         \
00162     .attributesAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,            \
00163     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                   \
00164     .commandsAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                       \
00165     .commands = (uint8_t *) clcommands                                        \
00166   }
00167 
00168 #define OTAU_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands)  \
00169   {                                                                           \
00170     .id = OTAU_CLUSTER_ID,                                                    \
00171     .options = {                                                              \
00172       .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE,                                        \
00173       .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY,                           \
00174       .reserved = 0},                                                         \
00175     .attributesAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,            \
00176     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                   \
00177     .commandsAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                       \
00178     .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *) clcommands                              \
00179   }
00180 
00181 /***************************************************************************/
00191 #define OTAU_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00192   {                                                                    \
00193     .id = OTAU_CLUSTER_ID,                                             \
00194     .options = {                                                       \
00195       .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE,                                 \
00196       .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY,                    \
00197       .reserved = 0},                                                  \
00198     .attributesAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,     \
00199     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                            \
00200     .commandsAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                \
00201     .commands = (uint8_t *) clcommands                                 \
00202   }
00203 
00204 #define OTAU_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands) \
00205   {                                                                          \
00206     .id = OTAU_CLUSTER_ID,                                                   \
00207     .options = {                                                             \
00208       .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE,                                       \
00209       .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY,                          \
00210       .reserved = 0},                                                        \
00211     .attributesAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,           \
00212     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                  \
00213     .commandsAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                      \
00214     .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *) clcommands                             \
00215   }
00216 
00217 #define DEFINE_OTAU_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) OTAU_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00218 #define DEFINE_OTAU_CLUSTER_FLASH(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) OTAU_CLUSTER_##cltype##_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands)

00221             ( sizeof(ZCL_Status_t) + sizeof(uint16_t) + sizeof(ZCL_OtauImageType_t) \
00222               + sizeof(ZCL_OtauFirmwareVersion_t) + sizeof(uint32_t) + sizeof(uint8_t) )

00333 BEGIN_PACK
00334 typedef union PACK
00335 {
00336   uint16_t memAlloc;
00337   struct PACK
00338   {
00339     uint16_t securityCredentialVersionPresent : 1;
00340     uint16_t deviceSpecificFile               : 1;
00341     uint16_t hardwareVersionPresent           : 1;
00342     uint16_t reserved                         : 13;
00343   };
00344 } ZCL_OtauHeaderFieldControl_t;
00345 
00346 typedef struct PACK
00347 {
00348   ZCL_OtauTagID_t tagID;
00349   uint32_t        lengthField;
00350 } ZCL_OtauSubElementHeader_t;
00351 
00352 typedef union PACK
00353 {
00354   uint32_t versionId;
00355   struct PACK
00356   {
00357     uint8_t appRelease;
00358     uint8_t appBuild;
00359     uint8_t stackRelease;
00360     uint8_t stackBuild;
00361   };
00362 } ZCL_OtauFirmwareVersion_t;

00565 typedef struct PACK

00569   {

00571     {

00578     };

00580     {

00584     };
00585   };
